alert.note: Alert for Parker Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:46PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central La Paz and San Bernardino Counties through 415 PM MST... At 246 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Parker, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Parker, Buckskin Mountain Park and Bouse. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 72 between mile markers 14 and 26. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 125 and 146, between mile markers 148 and 154, and between mile markers 156 and 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
